title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a built-in model library and OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and pull models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, OpenAI-compatible proxy).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; strong typing, streaming, pull/create models, embeddings.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose snippets for running Ollama server plus GPU (CUDA/ROCm) variants.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Community-built rich terminal UI for interactive chat, model switching, and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot (VS Code)
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as an inline Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot template combining Ollama + Chroma + LangChain for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-nim-sdk
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API; async HTTP, streams, and strong type definitions.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-chat UI that added Ollama backend support so you can switch between local providers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers users with Ollama models; supports threads, slash commands, and moderation.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration and starter exposing Ollama as a REST service with actuator endpoints.

title: ollama-crystal
summary: Crystal language shard for Ollama; simple DSL for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.
